summary: Godzilla is threatened by two new forces: Mogera - another UN built machine; and Space Godzilla - a beast spawned from Godzilla's particles in space.
cast: Megumi Odaka|Jun Hashizume|Zenkichi Yoneyama|Akira Emoto|Towako Yoshikawa|Yôsuke Saitô|Kenji Sahara|Hiroshi Ishikawa|Akira Nakao|Kôichi Ueda|Hôka Kinoshita|Ronald Hoerr|Eddie Quinlan|Ed Sardy|Tom Duran|Hitoshi Kusanagi|Taro Horiuchi|Keiko Imamura|Senzaburô Makimura|Sayaka Osawa|Kunihiro Matsumura|Kanji Watanabe|Akihisa Hattori|Kenpachirô Satsuma|Ryo Hariya|Yutaro Mitsuoka|Wataru Fukuda|Kenichi Kimihira|Little Frankie|Hideyuki Umeda|Yohei Ohsawa|Zengoro Mamiana|Hisayoshi Izaki|Shinichi Shimizu|Charlie Kraslavsky|Frank O'Cornor|Miho Arakawa|Maxie Marczykiewicz|Kazuki Kosakai|Andrew Smith|Tôru Minegishi|Rik Thomas

title: Gojira vs. Supesugojira
